title: DOJ Won’t Pursue Coders Who Build Decentralized Platforms in Good Faith
summary: The US Justice Department said it will not prosecute developers who build decentralized crypto platforms in good faith without criminal intent. The post DOJ Won’t Pursue Coders Who Build Decentralized Platforms in Good Faith appeared first on Cryptonews .
